pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Qualtrics Survey Data Directly into R // Qualtrics https://www.qualtrics.com/about/ allows users to collect online data through surveys. This package contains convenience functions to pull survey results straight into R using the Qualtrics API. See https://api.qualtrics.com/ for more information about the Qualtrics API. This package is community- maintained and is not officially supported by Qualtrics.
